Event.Message: Failed to initialize the backup components metadata in preparation for backup, status %1.
Failed to set context for shadow copy operations, status %1.
Failed to define overall configuration for a backup operation, status %1.
Failed to detect presence or absence of directly mapped disks like ISCSI and Fibre Channel disks in the system, status %1.
Could not find a matching original volume for shadow volume %1.
Some of the shadow Luns are not surfaced in the guest operating system.
Not all of the shadow volumes arrived in the guest operating system.
Hot backup is not supported on this version of the guest operating system, status %1.
The selected writer %1 is in a failed state, status %2, %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Writer status" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> </template>

Event.Message: The cluster disk with disk number %1 is not currently owned by this VM and hence cannot be snapshotted by this VM.

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceData" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StackFrameCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StackFrame" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64" count="StackFrameCount"/> <data name="ModuleCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="Module" count="ModuleCount"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SizeOfImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>
